attributes.action: Make it so school toilets cannot be locked ever
attributes.additional_details: As many students have medical problems cant access the toilets if this happens what are they meant to do, if a teenage girl is on her period how is she meant to change tampon or pad during school if her flow is heavy it is a very common and concerning problem that occurs nationwide
attributes.background: During educational hours schools will lock the toilets and will deny us of our basic human rights of going to the toilet, so I am asking for a law or change within this to make it so schools cannot do this

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703387
